New JomSocial and Hikashop Plugins

Mar 12, 2014

I've been busy tidying up and publishing some of the plugins and extensions that I use across my sites. Most of the plugins are simple extensions for JomSocial that add a bit of extra functionality that is not included within the core but there are also a few for Hikashop and Virtuemart as well.

I still have some other extensions and components planned for release over the coming weeks / months and will release these as they are finalised and tested. Most are simple but there are also one or two fairly complex components that I may also decide to publish.

So far the following plugins are available for purchase within the webstore:

 

JomSocial:

JomSocial - Infinite Scroll

This adds infinite scrolling effect to photos, videos, events and groups pages - just like Google and Facebook

JomSocial Auto Group

Automatically adds new members to the preselected group / groups 

JomSocial Auto Friend

Automatically adds selected user as friend of all new registrations - a bit like MySpace's 'Tom'

JomSocial Auto Friend Accept

Automatically accept all friend requests (useful if you want to change the friends system to a 'favourites' system as I did with garagetrail.com)

JomSocial New User Stream Activity

Plugin to post activity announcing new users on activity stream 

JomSocial Photo Fader module

Simple photos fader to display latest photos / album photos in module position

JomSocial Activity Stream Module

Display a condensed Activity stream in a module position

 

HikaShop:

HikaShop JomSocial Plugin

Plugin to display latest HikaShop activity on JomSocial activity stream

Hikashop Infinite Scroll

Adds infinite scrolling effect to Products and categories - just like Google and Facebook

 

Virtuemart:

Virtuemart Auto UserGroup

Add customers to user group on successful purchase of product

 

All of my plugins follow the rule of being simple and affordable. You will find no unnecessary features, just those that you need to do the job. Why pay premium prices for bloatware? If the feature isn't needed I don't include it and you don't have to pay for it. This keeps costs down, makes things easier to maintain and easier for the end user to use too. Additionally all of my extensions come with a money back guarantee. That's right - I guarantee that they will work or your money back! You can't say fairer than that!

All extensions include help via our support ticket system which you are given access to when you have completed a successful purchase.

All extensions also include all minor and incremental revision updates for free. 

 

Look out for the upcoming JomSocial Google XML site map component and the JomSocial Masonry activity stream!

 

 "simple, affordable plugins, extensions and modules that are guaranteed to work or your money back."
